name: Shoot and Scoot
text:
Target a unit at maximum range.
After the attack: If able, you may fast travel to an adjacent zone.

name: Trailblazer
text:
You may fast travel, if able.
**This round**: You and friendly heroes in radius may ignore obstacles while performing movement actions.

name: Snap Shot
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a unit in range, which is not adjacent to any other unit.
- Target a unit adjacent to you.

name: Opportunity Shot
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a unit in range, which is not adjacent to any other unit.
- Target a unit adjacent to you.

name: Long Shot
text: Target a unit at maximum range.

name: Clear Shot
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a unit in range, which is not adjacent to any other unit.
- Target a unit adjacent to you.

name: Rain of Arrows
text:
Target a unit at maximum range.
If you target a hero, repeat once on a different hero; if you do, may repeat once on a minion.

name: Grasping Roots
text: **This turn**: Enemy heroes in radius cannot fast travel, or move more than 1 space with a movement action.

name: Warning Shot
text: **End of turn**: An enemy hero in radius discards a card, if able.

name: Entangling Vines
text: **This turn**: Enemy heroes in radius cannot fast travel, or move more than 1 space with a movement action.

name: Grappling Branches
text: **This turn**: Enemy heroes in radius cannot fast travel, or move more than 1 space with a movement action.

name: Treetop Sentinel
text: **End of turn**: An enemy hero in radius discards a card, or is defeated.

name: Disorient
text: Move an enemy unit adjacent to you 1 space; if you do, you may move 1 space.

name: Fae Healing
text: A hero in radius may retrieve a discarded card; if they do, that hero gains 1 coin.

name: Divert Attention
text: Move an enemy unit adjacent to you up to 2 spaces; if you do, move up to that number of spaces in a straight line.

name: Lead Astray
text: Move an enemy unit adjacent to you up to 3 spaces; if you do, move up to that number of spaces in a straight line.

name: Nature’s Blessing
text: A hero in radius may retrieve a discarded card; if they do, that hero gains 2 coins.

name: Wild Hunt
text: Each time before you perform an action, you may move 2 spaces in a straight line.

name: Keep the Distance
text:
Target a hero at maximum range.
After the attack: If able, you may fast travel to an adjacent zone.
